snippet: Former Gov. Bob McDonnell and wife, Maureen, were given strict orders on Monday not to discuss anything “substantive” with potential witnesses, including family and close friends, about their forthcoming trial on corruption charges.
abstract: Former Virginia Gov Bob McDonnell and his wife Maureen are given strict orders not to discuss their forthcoming trial on corruption charges.
lead_paragraph: Former Gov. Bob McDonnell and wife, Maureen, were given strict orders on Monday not to discuss anything “substantive” with potential witnesses, including family and close friends, about their forthcoming trial on corruption charges.

headline.main: Virginia: McDonnells Warned to Restrain Speech
headline.print_headline: Virginia: McDonnells Warned to Restrain Speech
